description: Library of consulting frameworks and methodologies

columns.description: JSON array of typical use cases
JSON array of expected output components
JSON array of related framework codes
Number of times framework has been applied

seedData.description: Evaluate Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats to understand competitive position.
seedData.methodology: Identify internal strengths and weaknesses, external opportunities and threats.

seedData.description: Analyze industry structure through five competitive forces.
seedData.methodology: Assess threat of new entrants, supplier power, buyer power, threat of substitutes, and competitive rivalry.

seedData.description: Analyze macro-environmental factors: Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Environmental, Legal.
seedData.methodology: Systematically evaluate each factor's impact on the organization.

seedData.description: Portfolio analysis tool categorizing products by market growth and share.
seedData.methodology: Plot units on growth vs share matrix: Stars, Cash Cows, Question Marks, Dogs.

seedData.description: Analyze activities that create value and competitive advantage.
seedData.methodology: Map primary and support activities, identify value-adding steps.

seedData.description: Understand customer needs through the lens of jobs they are trying to accomplish.
seedData.methodology: Identify functional, emotional, and social jobs.

seedData.description: Visualize the end-to-end customer experience across touchpoints.
seedData.methodology: Map stages, touchpoints, actions, emotions, pain points.

seedData.description: Design and test value propositions that resonate with customer needs.
seedData.methodology: Map customer profile and value map.

seedData.description: Categorize product features by customer satisfaction impact.
seedData.methodology: Classify features as Must-be, One-dimensional, Attractive, Indifferent, or Reverse.

seedData.description: Strategic planning tool for growth strategy evaluation.
seedData.methodology: Evaluate four strategies: Market Penetration, Product Development, Market Development, Diversification.

seedData.description: Assess resources and capabilities for sustainable competitive advantage.
seedData.methodology: Evaluate resources on Value, Rarity, Imitability, Organization.

seedData.description: Create uncontested market space by differentiating from competition.
seedData.methodology: Apply ERRC grid (Eliminate, Reduce, Raise, Create) to redefine value curve.

seedData.description: Human-centered approach to innovation and problem-solving.
seedData.methodology: Progress through Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test phases.

seedData.description: One-page business model for startups and new ventures.
seedData.methodology: Complete nine blocks: Problem, Solution, Key Metrics, UVP, etc.

seedData.description: Visual tool for developing and documenting business models.
seedData.methodology: Complete nine building blocks covering customers, value, infrastructure, finances.

seedData.description: Analyze organizational effectiveness across seven interconnected elements.
seedData.methodology: Assess Strategy, Structure, Systems, Shared Values, Style, Staff, Skills.

seedData.description: Strategic management system translating vision into operational objectives.
seedData.methodology: Define objectives, measures, targets, initiatives across four perspectives.

seedData.description: Iterative questioning technique to identify root causes.
seedData.methodology: Ask Why repeatedly until root cause is identified.

seedData.description: Visual tool for categorizing potential causes of problems.
seedData.methodology: Map causes across categories (6Ms).

seedData.description: Responsibility assignment matrix for project roles.
seedData.methodology: Map activities to stakeholders with RACI designations.

seedData.description: Individual-focused change management framework.
seedData.methodology: Build Awareness, Desire, Knowledge, Ability, Reinforcement.

seedData.description: Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive approach to problem structuring.
seedData.methodology: Break down problems into non-overlapping, complete categories.

seedData.description: Compare current state to desired future state to identify gaps.
seedData.methodology: Define current state, target state, identify gaps, develop action plan.

seedData.description: Develop multiple plausible future scenarios to inform strategy.
seedData.methodology: Identify driving forces, uncertainties, create scenarios.

seedData.description: Systematic assessment of competitors strengths, weaknesses, and strategies.
seedData.methodology: Profile competitors, analyze capabilities, compare positioning.

seedData.description: Comprehensive assessment of financial health and performance.
seedData.methodology: Analyze ratios, trends, benchmarks across profitability, liquidity, solvency.

seedData.description: Calculate and compare return on investment for initiatives.
seedData.methodology: Identify costs, quantify benefits, calculate ROI, sensitivity analysis.

seedData.description: Calculate full lifecycle cost of assets or solutions.
seedData.methodology: Identify all direct and indirect costs across acquisition, operation, disposal.

seedData.description: Evaluate and prioritize risks by likelihood and impact.
seedData.methodology: Identify risks, assess probability and severity, develop mitigation.

seedData.description: Identify and analyze stakeholders to inform engagement strategies.
seedData.methodology: Map stakeholders by influence and interest, develop engagement strategies.

seedData.description: Evaluate and rank options based on weighted criteria.
seedData.methodology: Define criteria, assign weights, score options, calculate weighted scores.

seedData.description: Objectives and Key Results framework for goal setting.
seedData.methodology: Define inspiring objectives, set measurable key results, track progress.
